## task

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/tasks/src/task.ts" sourceLine="140" packageName="@commandkit/tasks" />

Creates a new task definition.

This is the main function for defining tasks in your application. Tasks can be
scheduled using cron expressions or specific dates, and can include preparation
logic to conditionally execute based on runtime conditions.



*Example*

```ts
import { task } from '@commandkit/tasks';

// Simple scheduled task
export default task({
  name: 'daily-backup',
  schedule: '0 0 * * *',
  async execute(ctx) {
    await performBackup();
  },
});
```

```ts title="Signature"
function task<T extends Record<string, any> = Record<string, any>>(data: TaskDefinition<T>): Task<T>
```
